title:
Topological rigidity of closures of certain sparse unipotent orbits in
  finite-volume quotients of $\prod_{i=1}^k\operatorname{SL}_2(\mathbb R)$
abstract:
We give a simple proof about the topological rigidity of closures of certain
sparse unipotent orbits in $G/\Gamma$ where
$G=\prod_{i=1}^k\operatorname{SL}_2(\mathbb R)$ and $\Gamma$ is an irreducible
lattice in $G$.
